thread.title: Parkopedia Announces Renewal of Global Parking Services Contract
thread.title_full: Parkopedia Announces Renewal of Global Parking Services Contract - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Parkopedia Announces Renewal of Global Parking Services Contract
text:
Parkopedia
MUNICH, Germany , September 10, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
Parkopedia's data will continue to be used by BMW Connected Drive Markets covered include Europe , the Americas, Australasia, Middle East and Africa Parkopedia offers detailed information on more than 38 million parking spaces in 53 countries. Parkopedia, the world's leading parking information provider, announced today that it has been confirmed as the parking information provider to the BMW Group until the end of 2019 following a competitive bid process.
Parkopedia will be providing drivers with premium parking information in Europe , North America , South America and Middle East and Africa . The service includes dynamic space availability and other features, which will support future parking services delivered by the BMW Group.
Commenting on the deal, Parkopedia's CEO Eugene Tsyrklevich said "We have been working closely with BMW for over 2 years and it has been a great experience. We are honoured to have been selected once more to power BMW's global parking service."
Parkopedia's COO, Dr. Hans Puvogel , added "We are all extremely excited to see how we can create an even deeper integration with BMW's in-car navigation and their ParkNow services. At Parkopedia, we constantly strive to improve the driver experience and look forward to working with BMW on integrating additional content and coverage to create an even better user experience".
Notes to editors:
Parkopedia is the world's leading parking service provider used by millions of drivers and organizations such as Audi, BMW, Daimler Financial Services, Ford, Garmin, Jaguar Land Rover, Peugeot, Toyota, Volvo, VW and many others. It provides detailed information on over 38 million parking spaces in 5 3 countries around the world, allowing drivers to find the closest parking to their destination, tells them how much it will cost and whether the space is available.
More Information:
